REGObject: class representing a list of regression model

Source: R/00-class.R
REGObject.Rd

Contains fields storing data and methods to build, process and visualize a list of regression model. Currently, this class is designed for CoxPH and GLM regression models.

Usage

REGObject(data, vars_y, vars_x, vars_c)

Arguments

data

A `data.table` storing input data.

vars_y

Predicted variables or formulas.

vars_x

Focal variables.

vars_c

Covariables.

Slots

data

A `data.table` storing input data.

mdata

A `data.table` storing cleaned data for modeling.

vars_x

Focal variables.

vars_y

Predicted variables or formulas.

vars_c

Covariables.

args

Other arguments used for building regression models.

models

Models built.

results

Model results, a object of `parameters_model`. Can be converted into data.frame with [as.data.frame()] or [data.table::as.data.table()].

.forest_data

More detailed data used for plotting forest.

Examples

x <- REGObject(
  data = mtcars,
  vars_y = "mpg",
  vars_x = c("factor(cyl)", colnames(mtcars)[3:5]),
  vars_c = c(colnames(mtcars)[8:9], "factor(gear)")
)
x
#> An object of class REGObject 
#> 	 variable y: mpg 
#> 	 variable x: factor(cyl),disp,hp,drat 
#> 	covariables: vs,am,factor(gear) 
#> 
#> model data head:
#>      cyl  disp    hp  drat   mpg    vs    am  gear
#>    <num> <num> <num> <num> <num> <num> <num> <num>
#> 1:     6   160   110  3.90  21.0     0     1     4
#> 2:     6   160   110  3.90  21.0     0     1     4
#> 3:     4   108    93  3.85  22.8     1     1     4
#> 4:     6   258   110  3.08  21.4     1     0     3
#> 5:     8   360   175  3.15  18.7     0     0     3
#> 6:     6   225   105  2.76  18.1     1     0     3
